snippet: As in many larger cities across the country, modernization and history are facing off in Cheyenne, Wyo., the scene of a battle over the fate of three homes.
abstract: Property owners Rande and Rita Pouppirt and Maureen Kougl are offering several historic houses in Cheyenne, Wyoming, for free to any applicant willing to move structures to new location; owners wish to redevelop property, but city's Historic Preservation Board has forbidden destruction of historic homes.
lead_paragraph: As in many larger cities across the country, modernization and history are facing off in Cheyenne, Wyo., the scene of a battle over the fate of three homes.

headline.main: A Frontier Land Dispute, Circa 2015, Pits Modernization Against the Past
headline.print_headline: A Frontier Land Dispute, Circa 2015, Pits Modernization Against the Past
